Notes to help locate it Locality Longitude Latitude Error loading Google Maps map Without the location permission it cannot be obtained automatically its location to record the sighting or see those already registered. The location permission is not granted. Please grant it to be able to locate you!!! A location has not been provided to the Geocoder service and therefore I cannot find out your locality. Error: locality recognition service not available. Error: the indicated latitude or longitude is wrong. Please check them!! No address found for that latitude and longitude Address not found ERROR: you have not indicated any receiver to collect the results of the locality request.
How is the nest Who are you How is the nest? Type You don\'t know which type it is? Help Select the nest support How high is the nest (in meters)? Was there wasps around? Yes No Types of nests -
Height up to 1 meter and between 40 and 80 cm in diameter. Size of a tennis ball (diameter smaller than 10 cm). You can eliminate the queen with a fly swatter. It usually appears in early spring and is temporary. It usually appears from early summer until autumn and is the final of the colony. Built with a texture similar to very fine papier-mâché. Built with a very rough material. In areas protected from rain and air: garages, sheds, eaves, cornices, holes, walls, floor, ... Places high as trees. They can also appear on some ledge and very occasionally on shrub and even on the ground. . They have the entry below. They have the entrance on one side. CLOSE Who are you? Full name This data will be stored in a safe place and used with the only purpose of carrying out the service for which they were requested, maintaining the privacy. To continue the user must accept the %1$s Privacy Policy %2$s. I accept the Privacy Policy Send sighting
You must accept the privacy policy to continue!. There are mandatory fields without filling in. Please check your data again!. Municipality Uploading photos... ERROR: Uploading photos An error has occurred while uploading the sighting photos. No internet connection There is no internet connection and it is necessary to store and send the sighting.\n Please check your internet connection and try again!! Sending the sighting. Please wait...!!!! Error when getting the number of sightings that were reported for that year in that municipality. Error when getting the number of sightings! Error when adding sighting to database Error when adding sighting! 610255111 Compartir por Whatsapp Permission to read the contacts is required to check if you have the official whatsapp number add as a contact to be able to send the sighting by Whatsapp. Without this permission, the operation to notify the sighting cannot end.
If you don\'t have the official Whatsapp number required to send the sighting added in the device contact list it is imperative that it is added. This process of adding the contact will be done automatically by you, if you grant this permission. \n Without it, you won\'t be able to send the whatsapp.
Creation of a new contact for the Whatsapp We will proceed to create a new contact with the name of \"WaspAlarm\".\n This contact is required in order to be able to send the whatsapp with the sighting data. ACCEPT CANCEL If you don\'t create the new contact, you won\'t be able to register your sighting and therefore notify it to the relevant authorities. Contact created successfully To continue with the sending, press the button com.whatsapp WHATSAPP not installed No Whatsapp installed application has been detected.\n Please, proceed to install it in order to be able to send the sighting!! You haven\'t been granted permission to read the contacts. Without it, it can\'t be checked if you already have the necessary contact to send the Whatsapp. Please, grant it! You haven\'t been granted permission for storage. It is necessary to send the Whatsapp with the sighting data. Please, grant it!!! .txt DETAILED INFORMATION ABOUT THE SIGHTING Nest stand How high is the nest (in meters)? Sighting Date How to go on with the sending Follow the instructions below and the information will be sent by Whatsapp to \"WaspAlarm\":\n\n 1.- A Whatsapp window will automatically appear.\n 2.- Select the contact \"WaspAlarm\" and click on.\n 3.- Click on the green button for the whatsapp to be sent.\n 4.- As the sending includes pictures, you must press again on the same green button for the pictures to be sent.\n Send by WHATSAPP If you don\'t send the whatsapp, the sighting won\'t be notified to the relevant authorities who are responsible for its treatment. Invalid latitude Invalid longitude Municipality not detected or without manually entering New nest/wasp sighted As an attachment, the photos and data of a new nest sighted are sent through the WaspAlarm application. Send by email:
Contact Subject Message SEND Enter a subject for the message Enter a message to send Choose an application to send the email
About This application is designed to assist in the eradication of the Asian Hornet in Asturias. The data collected will be stored in a database and will also be send to the Ministry of Infrastructures, Territorial Planning and Environment through Whatsapp 610255111 or in case of not having Whatsapp application will be sent by email to info@avisap.es as establish BOPA 104 of Friday, May 31, 2019 of the Principality of Asturias.\n\n The project has been developed as the Final Project of the Master in Application Development on Mobile Devices of the Polytechnic University of Valencia by Mª Alejandra Tomás Fernández under the direction of Vicente Carbonell.\n\n The ownership of the application, as well as the idea and development belong to Mª Alejandra Tomás Fernández.\n\n The black wasp icon used as a marker on Google Maps, as well as the nest icon also used as Google Maps marker have been made by Freepik: \"Icon made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com\".
How to use WaspAlarm
